#summary Releases, updates, upgrades, betas and Sparkle

== MacFusion 1.0 (2007-04-22) ==

Version 1.0 is available from the [http://www.sccs.swarthmore.edu/users/08/mgorbach/MacFusionWeb/ MacFusion home page].

= MacFusion 1.01 B1 (2007-04-27) =

Version 1.01 B1 incorporating bug fixes and an improved version of the sshfs-static binary is available from the [http://groups.google.com/group/MacFusion-devel/browse_frm/thread/1cfcf158cbf11e1d MacFusion Google Group discussions area].

= Updates and upgrades to the MacFusion application =

[http://www.sccs.swarthmore.edu/users/08/mgorbach/MacFusionWeb/features.html Version 1.0] uses [http://sparkle.andymatuschak.org/ Sparkle] for instant self-update functionality so when the next beta/release is ready for widespread use, users should receive it automatically.
